scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ] src/slendr.js | uglifyjs --stats -vmc > dist/slendr.min.js
scripts.xbuild-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ] examples/example.js | uglifyjs --stats -vmc > .tmp/bundle.js
scripts.build-css: node-sass scss/slendr.scss dist/slendr.min.css && cleancss dist/slendr.min.css -do dist/slendr.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.dev: npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run xbuild-js && (npm run server & npm run watch)
